hero.title: Jhan Arvie is an aspiring Cybersecurity Enthusiast and Front-End Developer

about.title: about
description: I am an active learner in cybersecurity, originally from the Philippines and now based in Norway, with a focus on Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC). My experience with data analysis, front-end development, and tools like Splunk and Python has given me a strong foundation to explore security solutions.

Applying my technical and practical knowledge to continue grow in Business and Technology. Through my studies at Gokstad Akademiet, I'm building the expertise to help organizations develop secure and compliant systems. Every challenge is an opportunity to grow in this ever-evolving field.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: Let's connect! I'm eager to grow professionally and feel free to contact me for other requests
